items.title: Rio Film Festival Solidifies Position as Leading Latin American Festival With Record Number of Brazilian Films
items.excerpt: The 27 th edition of the Rio International Film Festival, Latin America’s largest fest, will take place between Oct. 2-12 and feature a record number of productions in Premiere Brasil, the selection dedicated to local films in and out-of-competition.
